accountId.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products. For example, *5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5*.

name.description: This property is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

key.description: This property is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

html.description: The display name, email address, and key of the user with the matched query string highlighted with the HTML bold tag.

displayName.description: The display name of the user. Depending on the user’s privacy setting, this may be returned as null.

avatarUrl.description: The avatar URL of the user.

total.description: The total number of users found in the search.

header.description: Header text indicating the number of users in the response and the total number of users found in the search.
Header text indicating the number of groups in the response and the total number of groups found in the search.

total.description: The total number of groups found in the search.

html.description: The group name with the matched query string highlighted with the HTML bold tag.

title.description: The title of the group label.

type.description: The type of the group label.

groupId.description: The ID of the group, if available, which uniquely identifies the group across all Atlassian products. For example, *952d12c3-5b5b-4d04-bb32-44d383afc4b2*.

description: List of users and groups found in a search.
